metadata.title: CVE-2019-8696 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A buffer overflow issue was addressed with improved memory handling. Thisissue is fixed in macOS Mojave 10.14.6, Security Update 2019-004 HighSierra, Security Update 2019-004 Sierra. An attacker in a privilegednetwork position may be able to execute arbitrary code.

criterions.comment: cups: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
